amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 108-497 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 645. The amendment clarifies that no broader change is intended generally with respect to a federal court's review over an agency's interpretation of regulations and the "deference" given that agency, and that H.R. 2730 directs which agency is afforded such deference. The amendment is intended to address jurisdictional concerns raised by the Judiciary Committee.

action.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
